title: Labor D inelastic, min wage raises labor earnings

content.question: An effective minimum wage policy in a competitive market will increase unemployment and increase the total earnings of labor only if the demand for labor is

choices.label: positively related to the wage rate

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
